info.name: PetConnect
info.description: Collection of HTTP requests for testing the PetConnect project's RESTful API. Includes endpoints for authentication, user management, clinics, pets, medical records, and digital certificates. Organized by functional domains.

item.name: User Management
item.description: Endpoints for managing user profiles (owners, clinical staff) and staff administration operations by clinic administrators (creating, activating/deactivating VET/ADMIN users).

item.name: Pet Management
item.description: Endpoints for complete pet management: owner registration, clinic activation/update, veterinary partnership management, list and detail viewing.

item.name: Records Management
item.description: Endpoints to create, read, update (if applicable), and delete pet medical history records, including vaccination details and digital signature management.

item.name: Certificates Manegement
item.description: Endpoints related to the generation, visualization and (conceptually) verification of digital vaccination/health certificates.
